title: Lt. Col. Vindman and Jennifer Williams Give Damning Impeachment Testimonies: A Closer Look | Thomas Middleditch
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the House’s third day of public impeachment hearings featuring testimonies from two witnesses with firsthand knowledge of President Trump’s phone call with the president of Ukraine.

Then, Thomas Middleditch talks about the final season of Silicon Valley and acting for a video game, and shares the details of flirting in chatrooms as a teenager.

Thomas also talks to Late Night supervising producer Henry Melcher backstage exclusively for this podcast.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
